question: Sir,I have been taking Atenlol for the past 35 years. I had IHD in the year 1977.However i have no problem with this so far. Recently i had Type II diabetes, my doctor has suggested me to stop Atenlol and start taking Cresar (Telmisartan40mg) which will allso take care of the diabetes besides Diabetic kidney disease. Will you give your opinion about Telmisartan?
title: CHANGE OVER TO TELMISARTAN 40 MG
